name: Hentai Nureta Puzzle Power Girls
description:
Can you imagine what Power Girls Puzzle are hiding?



Hentai Nureta Puzzle is an extremely relaxing game.
Listen to music and arrange pictures with cute girls in cool situations.
The puzzle is extremely simple for you to enjoy the relaxation.


Simply choose a girl in a main menu and hit Play Game button. You will have 2 pictures to assemble.
When you assemble pictures for all 5 girls you will unlock additional 2 pictures.
It's a nice surprise and you will love it :)
